DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old time inform consent Relapsed refractory solid tumor follow standard therapy . ECOG Performance Status 0 1 . History insulindependent diabetes , type 2 diabetes , hemoglobin A1c > 6 % screening . History myocardial infarction within 12 month prior Day 1 chronic heart failure .
